creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: sketchy image; gray ground; skyline with dome at center; boat masts (?) at left and right; bridge or barge at center; white highlights
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [PNY89117 / 38125] and [CB179]; also see Signed
markings: bottom center, stamped in the image, in red: [HCG (monogram)]
medium: Etching with plate tone and scraping, numbered 4 of an edition of 5
provenance: Collection of Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, Minnesota
signed: below image, in pencil: [1er Etat tiré par l\'auteur á 5, no. 4, H. Guérard]
title: Row of Boats
